trends: There has been one other sighting in Jenkintown
There were no other sightings in Jenkintown on or around November 1st 2012
divs: sighting detailsmy boyfriend and i were walking the dog and as we were coming around the corner i saw this light out of the corner of my eye, it was bright, orange\reddish. at first i thought it was just a plane utnil i saw 4 more just like it, just hovering in the sky. i told my boyfriend to look over in that direction and asked what he thought, and we both at the same time said, no way could these be planes, they were to close together, in a formation, one by one they just ascended into the clouds.
Summary: 5 objects bright orange/red hovering in a formation
